titleStmt.title: A review of a certain pamphlet under the name of one John Lilburne. By a well-willer to the peace of Sion. Imprimatur. John Downame.
titleStmt.author: Well-Willer to the Peace of Sion.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Thomas Vnderhill, dwelling at the Bible in Wood-street.,

notesStmt.note: A reply to: Lilburne, John. A copie of a letter, .. to Mr. William Prinne, Esq. (Wing L2092).
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
